member.name: PKU2U_CERTIFICATE_S4U_LOGON
member.summary: Specifies a certificate used for S4U logon.

member.name: PKU2U_CERTIFICATE_S4U_LOGON.MessageType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that indicates the logon type.

member.name: PKU2U_CERTIFICATE_S4U_LOGON.Flags
member.summary: This member is reserved. Do not use it.

member.name: PKU2U_CERTIFICATE_S4U_LOGON.UserPrincipalName
member.summary: The name of the user who is attempting to authenticate.

member.name: PKU2U_CERTIFICATE_S4U_LOGON.DomainName
member.summary: This member is reserved. Do not use it.

member.name: PKU2U_CERTIFICATE_S4U_LOGON.CertificateLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the Certificate buffer.
